message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $14000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $16000. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $13500?

I understand that $13500 is still a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product to you for $15500. It's the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $13500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
